human being and the hamzah of the people.And the storming of it and (it is reduced from the ethnic and its name is the guarantee of the one who is deleted.The empty calculation of the emirate contrary to the right of the juice and its comfort, and the relative to the bond, because it is in it who calculates that, but perhaps the greatest and the one who is the most For the covenant and what is meant by the human being, “Uday ibn Abi Rabiah and the Sheet of the Akhans ibn Shariq, who are the ones who were the Prophet ﷺ He says in them: O God To him, peace and blessings be upon him, and he said: O Muhammad I believe you, Muhammad These are the bones after their fatigue and separate them, and they will restore them with a new creation, so they went down, and not like the will of the gender, and because of the descent, it does not mean it, and the remembrance of the bones, and the remembrance And the collection of its separate parts, because it is the template of creation.We gathered after separating it and its backs, as a thief and a shower in the stomachs of the seas and the sacrifice of the flesh, and wherever the state of our eyes was, and the two people are lost.After me, and it is the saying of Sibuyeh, and it was said that it was a news that we were in the beginning.We appreciate, as the estimation is in place.I passed a man, because he is in a position, and he was contemplated.A single gang of one of which is a milk, and it was interpreted by the one who is desired by the injustice, and then he said, it was called with that, because it has the righteousness Other than what is small in the bones of the frames, such as the two hands and the two men, and in the dictionary of Lebanon, the Sabbath or its parts, the meaning is the gathering of the bones.Until his forgetfulness is his shift, which is his perpetrator and the last thing that he created, or on the authority to forget and join his peace be upon them, and his peace be upon her, so that they were with their children, so they were so First of all, it is not a shortage How is the great bones and what is not in the parties of them?Immediately, the remembrance means those who are able to do so, after the connotation of piety is a certainty of the meaning of the verb, because the gathering is from the verbs that it is necessary for the sake of the one who is from it the whole of the part The body or its aspiration, and the second indicates the realization of the complete gathering, then if it is estimated at the Friday of the Father, the distance is usual for the return, then it is the same (p-138) The most horizontal.And it is known from them a joke that specializes in Lebanon with the remembrance, and the meaning was said to me, and we are able واحِدًا كَخُفِّ البَعِيرِ وحافِرِ الحِمارِ ولا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَها فَلا يُمْكِنُهُ أنْ يَعْمَلَ بِها شَيْئًا مِمّا يَعْمَلُ بِأصابِعِهِ المُفَرَّقَةِ ذاتِ المَفاصِلِ والأنامِلِ مِن فُنُونِ الأعْمالِ والبَسْطِ one who is.Group, the words benefit the preceding void, but from another side, which is that they will be given it if he is able to return it to a face that will be included in the same time The first
